dict.string: Welcome to WhatDoWear: you can start adding new dresses in the section: wardrobe. If you want disable this tutorial go to settings
Add the dress: From this form you can modify the picture (zoom, move, rotate) and insert its properties. You can put a bookmark pushing button on the up toolbar

There you can see all the dresses of selected type. In the up toolbar you can select the dresses catalogue by: hot, cold, both hot and cold and all.Otherwise you can order they by data or preference. If you push the button + you can add new dress into your wardrobe.
In this table you can see your look which are catalogue by: sporting, casual, elegant. You can also filter they by temperature

Create a look add the dresses present in wardrobe. Otherwise you can shake your phone. If you do a double tap on a dress, this will go zoom. If you push the tag button or drag up the look, you can see/modify its properties
If you want add a dress or look in bookmark, you can select the bookmark icon in the up toolbar of the dress or look form
